    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Whether session cookies will last across browser sessions. Okta Administrators can never have persistent session cookies.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Status</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>mfa<wbr>Prompt</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Prompt for MFA based on the device used, a factor session lifetime, or every sign on attempt: `"DEVICE"`, `"SESSION"` or `"ALWAYS"`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>mfa<wbr>Remember<wbr>Device</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/boolean">boolean</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Remember MFA device. The default `false`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>mfa<wbr>Required</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/boolean">boolean</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Require MFA. By default is `false`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Policy Rule Name.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>network<wbr>Connection</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Network selection mode: `"ANYWHERE"`, `"ZONE"`, `"ON_NETWORK"`, or `"OFF_NETWORK"`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>network<wbr>Excludes</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string[]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The network zones to exclude. Conflicts with `network_includes`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>network<wbr>Includes</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string[]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The network zones to include. Conflicts with `network_excludes`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>priority</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/integer">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Policy Rule Priority, this attribute can be set to a valid priority. To avoid endless diff situation we error if an invalid priority is provided. API defaults it to the last/lowest if not there.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>session<wbr>Idle</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/integer">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Max minutes a session can be idle.",
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>session<wbr>Lifetime</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/integer">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Max minutes a session is active: Disable = 0.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>session<wbr>Persistent</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/boolean">boolean</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Whether session cookies will last across browser sessions. Okta Administrators can never have persistent session cookies.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>status</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Policy Rule Status: `"ACTIVE"` or `"INACTIVE"`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>users<wbr>Excludeds</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string[]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Set of User IDs to Exclude
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The network zones to include. Conflicts with `network_excludes`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Policyid</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Policy ID.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Priority</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Policy Rule Priority, this attribute can be set to a valid priority. To avoid endless diff situation we error if an invalid priority is provided. API defaults it to the last/lowest if not there.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Session<wbr>Idle</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Max minutes a session can be idle.",
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Session<wbr>Lifetime</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Max minutes a session is active: Disable = 0.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Session<wbr>Persistent</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Whether session cookies will last across browser sessions. Okta Administrators can never have persistent session cookies.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Status</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Policy Rule Status: `"ACTIVE"` or `"INACTIVE"`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Users<wbr>Excludeds</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Set of User IDs to Exclude
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}
